General.Name: Xilong Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Xilong Scientific Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells chemical reagents in China. The company offers chemical reagents, PCB reagents, high purity chemical reagents, food additives, active pharmaceutical, wet electronic chemical, and diagnostic reagents products. It also exports its products. The company serves industrial, agriculture, health, environmental protection, teaching, scientific research, biology, life sciences, electronics, military industry, aerospace, coating, printing and cosmetics, medical and health, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as Xilong Chemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xilong Scientific Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Xilong Scientific Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Shantou, China.
General.Address: No. 2 Xilong Middle Street, Shantou, China, 510663
